master.description: Master orchestrator agent - single entry point for automation framework

decomposer.description: Task decomposition agent - intelligently breaks down tasks and orchestrates specialized agents

test_case_generator.description: Test case generator agent - generates test cases from OpenAPI specifications
capabilities: Generate test cases from OpenAPI schema
Support multiple test types (integration, system, component, regression, sanity)

test_case_executor.description: Test case executor agent - executes test cases and generates reports
capabilities: Execute test cases by test type
Support all HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE)
